variableManagement.description: Variables are used to store information collected during the conversation

variables.name: EmployeeName
variables.usage: Stores employee's full name for personalization and HR notification

variables.name: Department
variables.usage: Determines which checklist to display and includes in HR notification

variables.name: JobTitle
variables.usage: Stores job title for HR notification

variables.name: StartDate
variables.usage: Stores official start date for HR coordination

variables.name: Equipment
variables.usage: Comma-separated list of equipment selections for IT preparation

variables.name: SatisfactionRating
variables.usage: Optional feedback for analytics and improvement

variableManagement.variableSyntax: Use {VariableName} in message text to insert variable value
variableManagement.variableClearing: Variables are cleared when conversation ends
